Public safety officers put their lives on the line every day to protect us from serious threats. Whether they are law enforcement officers, firefighters, or emergency medical technicians, public safety officers selflessly charge into danger zones when others are in need.

During #COVID19, public safety officers are bravely answering the call of duty. While our citizens are doing their best to engage in social distancing, public safety officers remain on the job, seeking to protect and heal us in ways that may lead them to be exposed to the virus.

We must do all we can to help public safety officers prevent exposure to COVID-19 while they are on duty. If they do contract this highly contagious and dangerous virus, we must fully support them and their families.  #ProtectFirstResponders

#FamiliesFirst means protecting small businesses nationwide. That‚Äôs why Democrats fought for & won an expansion of fast relief for small businesses ‚Äì and made rent, mortgage and utility costs eligible for SBA loan forgiveness.

Millions of American families rely on small businesses for their livelihoods. Any effort to protect our economy must prioritize these local leaders. #FamiliesFirst
State and local governments are leading the charge against COVID-19. Congress must ensure they have the resources needed to keep up the fight and protect our communities. #FamiliesFirst
People over corporations. It‚Äôs that simple. #FamiliesFirst
